title: Did a flight reporter send an account of Red Aye's trip full of unaccompanied immigrant children?
subtitle: Facebook described what it was like to accompany sixteen "frightened little souls" on a cross-country trip to a detention facility in the middle of the night.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Facebook articles published by commercial flight attendants describe their experiences in flights that transport unaccompanied migrant children to detention facilities.
